heading: fading fury?
subheading: they celebrated the 20th anniversary of the storming of the american embassy in tehran thursday, but it appears that iran's old revolutionary fervor may be waning. unlike previous anniversary rallies, where hundreds of thousands of people showed up to proclaim their hatred of the great satan, a paltry 10,000 were on hand to pay homage to this cornerstone of iran's islamic revolution.
author: wired staff
text: they celebrated the 20th anniversary of the storming of the american embassy in tehran thursday, but it appears that iran's old revolutionary fervor may be waning. unlike previous anniversary rallies, where hundreds of thousands of people showed up to proclaim their hatred of the great satan, a paltry 10,000 were on hand to pay homage to this cornerstone of iran's islamic revolution.
